name: DailyBibleVerse
0:
”Alexa, open my daily Bible”
”What's my daily verse”
”Finish my daily verse”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my daily bible
des:
Word in my Heart is a scripture/bible verse memorization skill that allows you to work through 73 verses as many times as you'd like and when you feel confident that you have the verse memorized you can check it off and move to the next verse!

Even more verses are on the way!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
